blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: “maybe im weird but I actually really like the gaming videos that they been making recently. I kinda enjoy the simplicity of the...
body:
“maybe im weird but I actually really like the gaming videos that they been making recently. I kinda enjoy the simplicity of the games and dnps interactions and commentary more than when they make longer videos playing “real” games. Like, for example I liked the pong video a lot more than I liked pubg and the sims. But idk maybe its just me”


Again this was submitted to me instead of being sent to my ask, but anon, you’re allowed to have your preferences. Do you, booboo.

title: One Last Time
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2OpXGDQ

by ineffabledaniel

Phil left Dan a week ago, and it only took that week for Dan to realize he can’t carry on without Phil. He has to see him one last time to say a few final words.

summary: Sometimes i still like to fantasize about how Dan and Phil filmed themselves around some spots in every country they've been to...
body:
Sometimes i still like to fantasize about how Dan and Phil filmed themselves around some spots in every country they’ve been to and make all of it Tour Ditl

And maybe this is why they didn’t do an insta story everywhere. Let me live and dream.

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: If Dan and Phil want to change their brand they can very easily do so. But the longer Dan waits to upload the more pressure he’s...
question: If Dan and Phil want to change their brand they can very easily do so. But the longer Dan waits to upload the more pressure he’s putting on himself to create something amazing and i feel like the two of them just make it harder for themselves considering they have a dedicated audience who will love 90% of what they upload but they still choose not to. I understand for Dan it’s a mental health thing but it’s also his career yk ?
answer:
I feel like that’s another thing that bothers me.


People are quick to let Dan off the hook because they assume it’s “a mental health thing”. But we don’t know if it is.


Youtube is still his job. If you refused to show up to the office for six months, you’d be fired. If you refuse to upload a YouTube video for six months, your audience gets bored or annoyed and they move on. Mental illness, especially well-treated and well-managed mental illness, isn’t really an excuse, y’know? And I hate talking about this because there’s always going to be an anon that comes at me for “hating the mentally ill” or whatever, when that isn’t true.


We don’t know what Dan’s life is like off camera. We don’t know what’s going on in his head. Maybe his lack of uploads are a result of poor mental health. But given the fact that he’s treating it, and managing it, and he appears to be in a good place, leads me to believe that it’s not necessarily a mental health issue. At least not entirely. I feel like it’s more or less a “lack of inspiration” issue. He either doesn’t have any ideas, or he just doesn’t want to make anything.


At the end of the day, he’s a big boy. If he doesn’t want to upload a video, he doesn’t have to. He’s his own boss. Nobody can fire him. But he’s gotta realize that the longer he waits, the less people are going to be watching when, or if, he comes back. If he doesn’t give a shit about numbers, that’s fine. But the numbers aren’t nothing when you make your living off of them.

tags: reblogs are super appreciated if you liked this!
but just reading this means a lot to me
summary: in the darkness, with you - chapter 15: denial
title: in the darkness, with you - chapter 15: denial
body:
Read from the start: https://archiveofourown.org/works/15674688/chapters/36415200

Read chapter 15:
https://archiveofourown.org/works/15674688/chapters/37720940

This fic is COMPLETE and will be posted twice a week (Sun/Thurs)!

THANK YOU to my amazing beta @insectbah  ❤️

Summary:
Phil, 28, video editor.
Phil doesn’t believe in love at first sight, and that is not about to change anytime soon. But what about lust? Just two short weeks ago, he’d say no, definitely not.

Not anymore. Not since he first locked eyes with Dan, the new intern at the company he works for. Not since he first thought, “I want him”.

Phil’s wish does come true, but there’s a catch.
It doesn’t mean anything.

Excerpt from chapter 15:
“I don’t know why I even mentioned him, really,” Dan mutters after a long stretch of silence. “You’re nothing like him.”
